content:
Certainly! Here is a table that shows the 16 geomancy figures in the columns and the 16 houses in the rows. Each cell represents the interpretation or meaning of the corresponding combination of figure and house:

| Houses/Figures | Populus | Via | Albus | Coniunctio | Puella | Amissio | Fortuna Maior | Fortuna Minor | Caput Draconis | Cauda Draconis | Acquisitio | Rubeus | Puer | Laetitia | Tristitia |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| House 1 | Uncertainty, potential | Movement, change | Purification, transformation | Union, communication | Love, harmony | Loss, release | Success, good fortune | Opportunity, small gain | Beginnings, ambition | Endings, letting go | Gain, profit | Violence, domination | Youth, energy | Joy, celebration | Sorrow, mourning |
| House 2 | Accumulation, resources | Business, commerce | Clarity, understanding | Negotiation, compromise | Beauty, art | Poverty, need | Increase, growth | Success, gain | Possessions, materialism | Loss, sacrifice | Investment, speculation | Violence, aggression | Impulsiveness, haste | Generosity, charity | Selfishness, hoarding |
| House 3 | Movement, communication | Travel, journeys | Learning, education | Conversation, ideas | Creativity, inspiration | Confusion, distraction | Short-term gain, small successes | Scattered energy, lack of focus | Siblings, neighbors | Short trips, errands | Information, news | Quarrels, arguments | Bravery, courage | Humor, wit | Criticism, cynicism |
| House 4 | Roots, ancestry | Home, family | Stability, security | Emotional foundation, memories | Nurture, comfort | Separation, estrangement | Legacy, inheritance | Property, real estate | Endings, closure | Beginnings, new home | Real estate, property | Restrictions, boundaries | Strength, endurance | Emotional fulfillment, satisfaction | Emotional deprivation, dissatisfaction |
| House 5 | Creativity, self-expression | Romance, love affairs | Children, creativity | Fun, entertainment | Fun, entertainment | Barrenness, infertility | Fame, recognition | Speculation, gambling | Romance, love affairs | Love, pleasure | Speculation, gambling | Quarrels, strife | Risk-taking, recklessness | Pleasure, enjoyment | Lack of fulfillment, disappointment |
| House 6 | Work, service | Employment, subordination | Health, illness | Service, humility | Work, service | Illness, disease | Routine, habit | Worry, anxiety | Routine, duty | Accidents, injuries | Work, service | Illness, disease | Competition, aggression | Work, effort | Fatigue, depletion |
| House 7 | Partnerships, marriage | Marriage, committed relationships | Contracts, legal agreements | Open enemies, conflict | Partnership, diplomacy | Divorce, breakups | Partnership, collaboration | Small legal gains, mediation | Open enemies, conflict | Cooperation, balance | Legal battles, disputes | Violence, aggression | Partnerships, alliances | Fairness, justice | Injustice, betrayal |
| House 8 | Sex, death, transformation | Inheritance, wills | Sex, death, transformation | Regeneration, power | Sexual issues, secrets | Loss, death | Sex, death, transformation | Gain, inheritance | Transformation, rebirth | Secrets, hidden things | Research, investigation | Betrayal, treachery | Sex, passion | Endings, closure | Secrets, hidden things |
| House 9 | Philosophy |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
